mapper.sql: select table_name as name, table_comment as comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables
mapper.select:
where table_schema = (select database()) AND table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' AND table_name NOT IN (select name from gen_table)
AND lower(table_name) like lower(concat('%', #{name}, '%'))
AND lower(table_comment) like lower(concat('%', #{comment}, '%'))
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by create_time desc
where table_comment <> '' and table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{name}
